triples.name: Ggplot2
triples.relevance: ggplot2 is the foundational visualization package that ggstatsplot builds upon to create enhanced statistical graphics.

triples.name: R (programming language)
triples.relevance: ggstatsplot is implemented as a package in the R programming language, providing one-line syntax for R users.

triples.name: Data visualization
triples.relevance: Data visualization is the core concept that ggstatsplot enhances by embedding statistical analysis results directly in visualizations.

triples.name: Exploratory data analysis
triples.relevance: The paper proposes ggstatsplot as a tool to facilitate rigorous and robust exploratory data analysis workflows in research.

triples.name: Statistics
triples.relevance: Statistical analysis is embedded in ggstatsplot visualizations to provide readers with validity assessment of statistical models.
